DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compere between Propofol-Ketamine combination and Dexmedetomidine-Ketamine combination for sedation in upper gastrointestinal endoscopy in paediatric patients.
DOC.brief_title: Sedation for Upper Gastrointestinal Endoscopy in Pediatric Patients
DOC.criteria: American Society of Anesthesiologists ASA III patients aging 27 years. known allergy to any of the study drugs, significant cardiovascular disease vomiting.
